CustomField.formula: IF( CloseDate>=DATE(2024,11,03), (IF(ACV_Bookings__c!=0, ACV_Bookings__c, IF( OR(of_Accessories__c!=0,of_HW_Products__c!=0,of_LIC_Products__c!=0,of_Serialized_Products__c!=0, SKP__c != 0), 0, IF(OR(ISNULL(License_Term__c),License_Term__c=0),Amount, Amount / License_Term__c *12 ) ))), ACV_Bookings_Copy__c )
CustomField.label: ACV Bookings
